@template public
{{div: class=white container}}


h1. Describe your project and get a free start!

Describe your project and we are returning a competitive offer by giving you a month for free!
 
{{contact_form: receiver_email:support@mothership1.com | custom | subject: Pricing Information}}
    h5. Email Address

    {{div: class=control-group}}
        {{ email: name=sender_email | required | placeholder= your email address}}
    {{div}}
    h5. Contact Name

    {{div: class=control-group}}
        {{ text: name=sender_name | required=true | placeholder= your name}}
    {{div}}

    h5. Phone Number

    {{div: class=control-group}}
        {{ text: name=phonenumber |  placeholder= phone number}}
    {{div}}

    h5. Service type

    {{dropdown: name=Select service type | id=selected_type | multiple
        * Machine
        * Storage
        * Desktop
    }}
  

    h5. Short description of your project!

    {{div: class=control-group }}
        {{ textarea: rows=10 | cols=100 | required | name=body}}
    {{div}}

    {{div: class=control-group}}
        {{submit: class=btn btn-primary btn-small | data-loading-text=Sending... }}
           {{html:KickStart!}} 
        {{submit}}
        {{ reset }}
    {{div}}
{{ contact_form }}

@divend
